resources.string: Password must contain at least 6 characters
You can find the item in your backpack.
This artefact represents the bull which serves as the mount of the god Shiva. This is 1 of the 3 artefacts that you should bring back to master Arnroth at the Magic Academy.
This artefact represents an artist and the many famous paintings in the museums of Paris. This is 1 of the 3 artefacts that you should bring back to master Arnroth at the Magic Academy.
This artefact represents the iconic red phone booths in London. This is 1 of the 3 artefacts that you should bring back to master Arnroth at the Magic Academy.
Level 2 is required to travel to Paris
Level 4 is required to travel to London
Level 6 is required to travel to India
Your fight was not registered due to a black magic Internet error
There is a problem with the magic connection to Internet
Master Arnroth has updated the objects in Wanderful World
You are not in range. Move closer.
Your hp is now set to max level
Your elements are set to max
You can have a maximum of 7 Element Powers of the same type.
You can use Plants to increase your Earth Powers, or use them in combination with a Scrollidge to gain more experience (xp)
You can use Flames to increase your Fire Power, or use them in combination with a Scrollipow to gain more combat points (cp)
You can use 1 Trombulus to increase your Air Powers, or use 4 Trombuluses in combination with a Scrollifly to conjure up a Travelwind
You can use Waterdrops to increase your Water Powers, or use them in combination with an Ancient Scrollifix to restore your health (hp)
The Healing Scrollifix lets you create a healing potion. The cost is 4 waterdrops and the Scrollifix itself.
The Mighty Scrollifix lets you increase your cp. The cost is 4 flames and the Scrollipow itself.
The Swift Scrollifly lets you create a Travelwind so you can travel to distant areas of Wanderful World. The cost to create a Travelwind is 4 Trombuluses and the Scrollifly itself.
The Ancient Scrollidge lets you increase your xp. The cost is 4 plants and the Scrollidge itself.
The Healing Potion lets you regain hp. Use it wisely since it will be consumed and removed from your backpack.
The Combat Potion lets you increase your combat power. Use it wisely since it will be consumed and removed from your backpack.
The Travelwind lets you travel to a distant place in Wanderful World. And it takes you back home again.

Greetings young apprentice. If you manage to bring back 3 artefacts you are accepted. A hint: You can find the artefacts in different areas of the Wanderful World. Pick up things on the map, use scrolls in your backpack and use 2 fingers to rotate/zoom on the map.
Contratulations! You managed to complete your task. I never thought anyone would do that. Ehum, well this means you are now accepted in the Magic Academy!
Hold down Trashcan if you want to remove the item
You need more flames. You collect them in Wanderful World.
You need more plants. You collect them in Wanderful World.
You need more trombuluses. You collect them in Wanderful World.
You need more waterdrops. You collect them in Wanderful World.
A healing potion was added in your backpack.
A combat potion was added in your backpack.
A Travelwind was added in your backpack. You can use it to travel to a distant place in Wanderful World. But in that case it is consumed.
The Travelwind is lifting you in the air and brings you to Paris, just outside of the famous cathedral Notre-Dame de Paris.
The Travelwind is lifting you in the air and brings you to London, just outside of the famous Tower of London.
The Travelwind is lifting you in the air and brings you to India, just outside of the famous Taj Mahal.
Everything starts spinning. You are lifted in the air by the powerful wind. Suddenly your home again.
You landed safe and sound. You can move around as usual and your location is shown on the map, but be careful. Keep in mind that this is not your real life location.
